#define GLAZIERY_SLIDER (  variable,
area,
groupField,
start,
end,
current   ) 
 

Value:

Slider * variable; \
   if ((variable = new Slider) == NULL) \
      throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
   if (area != NULL) \
      ((FieldsArea *) area)->appendField(variable); \
   if (groupField != NULL) \
      ((GroupField *) groupField)->appendField(variable); \
   variable->setStart(start); \
   variable->setEnd(end); \
   variable->setCurrent(current);
